    • Method Detail

      • format

        public static java.lang.String format(java.time.LocalDate date)
        Returns the given date as a well formatted String. The above defined DATE_PATTERN is used.
        Parameters:
        date - the date to be returned as a string
        Returns:
        formatted string

      • parse

        public static java.time.LocalDate parse(java.lang.String dateString)
        Converts a String in the format of the defined DATE_PATTERN to a LocalDate object. Returns null if the String could not be converted.
        Parameters:
        dateString - the date as String
        Returns:
        the date object or null if it could not be converted

      • validDate

        public static boolean validDate(java.lang.String dateString)
        Checks the String whether it is a valid date.
        Parameters:
        dateString -
        Returns:
        true if the String is a valid date
